p: K-LCP was artificial synthesized for the first time by hydrothermal process in the sealed Teflon-lined stainless steel autoclave (30 mL). Typical reaction conditions are as follows: Ca(OH) 2 (1 g, 13.51 mmol), K 2HPO 4 (5 g, 28.74 mmol), KOH (0.1 g, 1.79 mmol) and H 2O (10 mL, 555.56 mmol); 50 °C; 24 h.
